text: Under what circumstances would back bets on a selection be voided, while the lay bets remain? The back bets were placed before the lay bets. These bets were placed before the greyhound race started.

user_profile.real_name: Jon Jon Jon Jon Jon Jon Jon Jon
user_profile.name: fcmisc

elements.text: Under what circumstances would back bets on a selection be voided, while the lay bets remain? The back bets were placed before the lay bets. These bets were placed before the greyhound race started.

text:
check out this thread <https://betfairlightweight.slack.com/archives/C4H05ML2E/p1640699979363700>

tl;dr there was a nonrunner and all bets are voided when there's a nonrunner for greyhounds, your lay bets must've been placed after the scratch
